title: China to further rein in domestic tech giants to revive Internet sector - Business Standard
content:
1. China to further rein in domestic tech giants to revive Internet sector  Business Standard
  2. China Covid Lockdown Reveals Alibaba and Meituan Need  Bloomberg
  3. China set to shift policies to rein in domestic tech giants  Nikkei Asia
  4. exclusive | China to end regulatory storm over Big Tech and give sector bigger role in boosting slowing economy, sources say  South China Morning Post
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Alarmed at the slowing tech and internet sector, China is now planning to further shift its policies to control domestic tech giants like Alibaba and Tencent, as the country battles Covid-19 lockdowns
